ankietDevMainText: AnkietDev is a platform that enables you to create online surveys quickly and easily. Users can effortlessly view their survey results, and every created survey can be edited or deleted. Registration is fast, intuitive, and hassle-free.
ankietDevContact: The platform features a contact page with a form where users can request assistance or propose collaboration with the creator. Users can also submit suggestions for new features that should be added to the platform.
ankietDevRegisterText: The website offers a simple registration process with only three fields: email, password, and confirm password. No confirmation is required, making the process very fast — users can log in immediately after registering and create their first survey right away.
ankietDevDashboardText: The dashboard is where users can manage their surveys — delete, edit, or create new ones. They can also preview a selected survey. From here, users can navigate to the statistics page via the menu located on the left-hand side.
ankietDevCreateNewText: Creating a survey is simple — you can add both open-ended and multiple-choice questions with any number of answer options. Fast, easy, and effective
ankietDevStatisticsText: The platform allows users to review survey results in a clear percentage format and view open-ended responses. It also provides the number of answers for each question, as well as the total number of responses for the entire survey.
homeSubtitle: I create modern web applications with a passion for clean code and innovative solutions.
latestProjectSubtitle: My newest work that I've been working on
footerDescription: I create modern web applications with a passion for clean code and innovative solutions.
footerMadeWith: Made with ❤️ using React & Tailwind CSS
aboutDescription: I am a programming enthusiast in creating modern web and mobile applications. I specialize in PHP, JavaScript, React and Flutter, but I like to experiment with different technologies.

experienceZirto.title: PHP Developer
experienceZirto.description: Development of web applications in PHP
experienceZirto.details: I specialize in web application development using Symfony, vanilla PHP, and WordPress. I deliver comprehensive WordPress projects from design to deployment, ensuring performance optimization and implementation of advanced security mechanisms. I independently designed and implemented a project from the ground up in the Symfony framework. Simultaneously, I led the development of another project in vanilla PHP. I developed both projects full-stack, implementing frontend in React. I serve as the lead developer, working directly with clients through direct communication and participating in business meetings as a technical representative. My responsibilities also include creating automation scripts in Python, implementing integrations with external payment systems (PayPal) and communication services (SMS API), as well as ensuring code quality through writing unit tests in Symfony.

experienceIRONteam.title: PHP Developer
experienceIRONteam.description: Development of medical applications in PHP
experienceIRONteam.details: I worked in both vanilla PHP and the Symfony framework. This was the first project where I worked independently. As a mid developer, I took responsibility for the entire project as a full-stack developer, although frontend development was less frequent compared to backend. I developed a medical system for clinics and hospitals, working with an extensive database containing several million records. I designed and implemented APIs for external integrations. I also mastered SOAP (Web Services) API. Joining an already developed project, I had to work with legacy code, often refactoring and improving code written earlier by other developers.

experienceBluSoft.title: Junior PHP Developer
experienceBluSoft.description: Development of web and mobile applications
experienceBluSoft.details: I worked in a small team as a full-stack developer responsible for backend and frontend in JavaScript. We worked in Agile methodology, which allowed me to gain experience working in agile development teams. I developed a PPV (Pay-Per-View) streaming platform similar to Twitch.tv. During my work, I mastered payment system integration and real-time communication implementation using WebSocket in Express.js. I specialized in working with vanilla PHP, managed databases, and designed backend architecture according to business requirements.

experienceVocale.title: Junior Flutter Developer
experienceVocale.description: Development of mobile applications in Flutter
experienceVocale.details: I specialized in mobile application development using the Flutter framework. For a period of two months, I served as a team leader, managing a team of programmers and conducting code reviews. I developed mobile applications based on UI/UX designs in Figma, delivering projects for diverse industries - from catering applications to Trello-like solutions. During my work, I mastered advanced state management techniques using Bloc, as well as best practices in mobile application development. I participated in creating end-to-end tests and implementing backend integration through REST API. Over the course of two years, I systematically developed my skills through participation in numerous training sessions on clean code and advanced mobile application programming.

projectsDescription: Here are all the projects from my current portfolio. Each of them represents my skills and passion for creating modern solutions.
projectsComingSoonDescription: I'm working on new projects that will be available soon. Follow my social media to stay updated.
ankietDevDescription: AnkietDev is a modern web platform for creating, managing and analyzing surveys. Built in PHP using React and Tailwind CSS.
neoCasinoDescription: NeoCasino is a browser game simulating an online casino, created using React. The game offers a variety of games, providing users with entertainment and the excitement of a casino without the risk of losing real money.
neoCasinoMainText: NeoCasino is a browser game that simulates gambling games such as roulette, blackjack, and slots. The game was created using the React library, ensuring smooth performance and an attractive user interface. NeoCasino offers a variety of games that provide users with entertainment and the excitement of a casino without the risk of losing real money.
neoCasinoSlotText: The slot machine is one of the games available in NeoCasino. It is a classic 3x3 slot game with various symbols. The game offers simple and enjoyable gameplay, perfect for fans of casino slots.
neoCasinoLegendText: The game legend is a section in NeoCasino that explains the rules and mechanics of the games available on the platform. It is useful for players who have not previously encountered such games.
neoCasinoBlackJackText: Blackjack is a popular card game available in NeoCasino. The objective of the game is to get a hand value as close to 21 as possible without exceeding it, while also having a higher value than the dealer's hand.
neoCasinoRouletteText: Roulette is a classic casino game available at NeoCasino. This version of roulette is designed in the style of case openings from Counter-Strike 2, giving it a unique atmosphere and dynamic feel. Players can place various bets and enjoy an exciting gameplay experience full of tension and random thrills.
neoCasinoCrashText: Crash is a casino game available in NeoCasino. The game offers exciting gameplay and requires strategic thinking. A random multiplier increases over time until the game ends. If the user fails to cash out before the crash occurs, they lose.
neoCasinoScratchCardText: Scratch Card is a casino game available in NeoCasino. The game offers simple and enjoyable gameplay, perfect for fans of casino scratch cards. Players must decide how many cards they want to bet on, then scratch them to reveal the symbols and check if they won. The game provides excitement and adrenaline associated with discovering the results.
devLinkTitle: DevLink - Platform for finding people to work on projects together and share knowledge
devLinkDescription: DevLink is a modern web platform for finding people to work on projects together and share knowledge. Built in PHP using React and Tailwind CSS.
devLinkMainText: DevLink is a social platform created specifically for developers and creators. It enables finding people to work on projects together, sharing knowledge and experience. The platform offers an intuitive interface that allows users to easily connect and start collaborating on innovative projects.
devLinkLoginAndRegisterText: DevLink offers an extremely fast and easy registration. Account requires email confirmation, which ensures platform security. Using a nickname guarantees full user anonymity, allowing users to freely share knowledge and collaborate on projects without privacy concerns. The login system is intuitive and secure, utilizing modern authentication methods. After logging in, users have immediate access to all platform features.
devLinkContactText: DevLink has a contact page with a form where you can request help or propose collaboration with the creator. Users can also submit suggestions for features that should be added to the platform. The contact form allows for quick and direct communication with the DevLink team. All inquiries are thoroughly reviewed, and responses are provided within a few business days.
devLinkTermsOfServiceText: Terms of Service is a document that defines the rules and conditions for using the platform. It contains information about user rights and obligations, as well as principles of confidentiality and personal data protection. The terms are transparent and written in simple language so that every user can easily understand their rights and obligations. The document also includes information on conflict resolution procedures and data protection protocols.
devLinkProfileText: Profile is a place where users can manage their profile and announcements. They can add information about their skills, experience, and technologies they work with. From the profile, users can also manage chats and view their collaboration history with other users.
trackerProTitle: TrackerPro - Comprehensive application for managing job applications, budget and savings
trackerProDescription: TrackerPro is an advanced full-stack web application for managing job applications, vacation budget, and savings. Built using Symfony (backend) and React with TypeScript (frontend). The application is containerized using Docker, ensuring consistent development and production environments. The project includes comprehensive unit and integration test coverage on both frontend (Vitest) and backend (PHPUnit), ensuring high code quality and reliability.
trackerProMainText: The Dashboard is the central point of the application that presents all key information in one place. Users can view job application statistics (weekly and monthly), vacation budget overview, and latest applications. The panel has been designed with responsiveness and intuitive user interface in mind.
trackerProApplicationsText: The job applications module enables comprehensive management of the recruitment process. Users can add applications with information about company, position, and recruitment platform. The system tracks application status (applied, recruitment task, interview, got job, rejected, no response) and automatically saves status change history. The module offers advanced filtering, search functionality, and monthly statistics showing recruitment process efficiency.
trackerProBudgetText: The vacation budget module allows users to manage finances allocated for vacations. Users can add transactions (deposits and withdrawals), create savings goals with specified target amounts, and track progress in achieving them. The system automatically calculates total deposits and withdrawals and updates budget balance. Additionally, users can set the number of vacation months, enabling long-term planning.
trackerProSavingsText: The savings module offers an innovative approach to saving money. Users can save on small expenses (e.g., energy drinks) through a special button that automatically adds a specified amount to savings. The module also enables withdrawals and transfers of funds from savings to vacation budget. The system tracks all transactions, calculates weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics, allowing users to monitor savings progress.
trackerProAuthText: The application uses an advanced authentication system based on JWT (JSON Web Tokens). Registration requires email verification, ensuring user account security. The system supports refresh tokens for extended sessions and automatic token refresh. All API endpoints are protected by authorization, and users have access only to their own data.
trackerProBackendText: The backend was built in Symfony 7.4. The application uses Doctrine ORM for database management, Lexik JWT Bundle for authentication, and Nelmio CORS Bundle for cross-origin request handling. The architecture is based on the MVC pattern with a service layer responsible for business logic. The system uses database migrations and input data validation.
trackerProFrontendText: The frontend was created in React 19 with TypeScript, using Vite as a build tool. The application uses React Router for navigation, Axios for API communication, and i18next for internationalization. The interface was designed using Tailwind CSS, providing a modern and responsive design.
trackerProTechnologiesText: The project uses a modern technology stack: TypeScript provides type safety throughout the frontend application, React 19 offers a performant and responsive user interface, Symfony 7.4 forms a solid backend foundation. Docker enables application containerization, ensuring consistent development and production environments. All technologies have been carefully selected to ensure scalability, performance, and code maintainability.
trackerProTestsText: The application has comprehensive test coverage, ensuring high quality and code reliability. Unit tests (PHPUnit) cover business logic in the service layer, testing individual methods in isolation. Integration tests verify the interaction between different system components, including controllers, services, and repositories. All tests are automatically run in the CI/CD process, ensuring that every code change is immediately verified for correctness.
trackerProDockerText: The application is fully containerized using Docker, ensuring consistent development and production environments. Docker Compose enables easy management of multiple containers (backend, frontend, database) and their dependencies. Containerization provides environment isolation, easy deployment, and the ability to quickly scale the application. Each container has a defined Dockerfile that describes its configuration and dependencies, ensuring environment reproducibility across different machines.
